property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: If you control 3 or more characters with different power, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move a character to any Problem for the first time each turn, you may move another one of your characters with 1 less power to the same Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one or more opposing characters become exhausted, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has +1 power for each opposing exhausted character. At the end of your turn, choose an exhausted Friend. That Friend doesn't ready during its controller's next Ready Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay [X] to turn this card over, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of the Score Phase, you may exhaust this card and discard any number of random cards to dismiss an opposing non-token Friend with cost equal to the number of cards discarded this way.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Reveal your hand. If no two cards in your hand have the same name, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If you do, you may pay [1] less to play the first card with that card's name this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of a Problem faceoff, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: While an opponent controls a non-token Friend, that player can't retire token Friends for being in excess of their home limit. Main Phase: Pay [1] and exhaust this card to put a 1 White Unicorn Friend token with Prepared into play under an opponent's control.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of a Problem faceoff, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your Problems enters play, gain [1] and draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: While an opponent controls a Friend they do not own, you may pay [2] less to play this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, your other Friends have Traveler until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, you may frighten an opposing Friend. Opponents need +1 power to confront this card's Problem for each of their frightened Friends here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Talented: When you play an Event whose play requirement includes at least one of this card's colors, put a Muscle counter on this card. Your flipped cards have +1 power for each Muscle counter on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, if a player has 8 or more points, you may frighten a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Talented: When you play an Event whose play requirement includes at least one of this card's colors, you may move this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, put an Art counter on an opposing Resource. Resources with Art counters on them lose and can't have abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card's Problem's bonus is increased by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Talented: When you play an Event whose play requirement includes at least one of this card's colors, you may exhaust an opposing character. That character doesn't ready during its controller's next Ready Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, if a player has 8 or more points, you may distribute 2 +1 power counters among up to 2 of your Friends.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card can't be frightened. Immediate: Pay [1] to unfrighten one of your Friends.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may pay [1] less to play your first Friend with printed power 4 or more each turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card to exhaust an opposing character here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: During a faceoff, discard two cards to flip an additional card.

property.name: Text
property.value: If an opponent would force you to discard a card while this card is in your hand, you may discard this card instead. When this card is put into your discard pile from play, an opponent discards a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this card has 3 or less power, it has Diligent 1. While this card has 4 or more power, it can't be retired or dismissed except to home limit.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, if a Friend left play this turn, you may draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Talented: When you play an Event whose play requirement includes at least one of this card's colors, you may shuffle a Friend from your discard pile into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this card, you may dismiss a Friend here. If you do, put a token copy of that Friend into play under your control.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have at least 3 cards in your hand, this card has Agile. While you have at least 6 cards in your hand, this card has Eccentric 3. While you have at least 9 cards in your hand, this card has +2 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Talented: When you play an Event whose play requirement includes at least one of this card's colors, you may exhaust this card to draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, if a player has 8 or more points, you may dismiss a Friend with 2 or less power.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, if an opponent has more cards in their hand than you, draw cards until you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Retire this card. If you do, players need +3 power to confront this card's Problem until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you win a Troublemaker faceoff here, you may move an opposing character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: While this card is flipped, it has power equal to the highest power among opposing cards involved in the faceoff. This card has +1 power for each opposing character at other locations.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Exhaust this card to banish an Event from a discard pile. This card has +1 power for each Event in each Banished Zone.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play an Event with cost 2 or less, if a player has 8 or more points, you may banish this card to copy that Event's effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Talented: When you play an Event whose play requirement includes at least one of this card's colors, you may look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, if you have an even number of action tokens, you may put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, banish up to 4 cards from your hand face-down, then draw that many cards. You may play cards which you own that have been banished face-down by Friends named Zecora, Curative Cache as though they were in your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: If one of your other Friends would be dismissed or frightened, you may retire one of your Resources on that Friend instead. Your Friends with Resources on them have +1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Talented: When you play an Event whose play requirement includes at least one of this card's colors, you may pay [1] and banish this card to score a point.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this card, you may put a Friend with cost 2 or less from an opponent's discard pile into play under your control. If a player has 8 or more points, you may put a Friend with any cost from an opponent's discard pile into play under your control instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, you may put an attachment Resource from your hand into play attached to a Friend. You may pay [1] less to play Resources on Friends, to a minimum of [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent plays a card, if it is the second card they have played this turn, you may put a 1 [Generosity] Unicorn Friend token with Prepared into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: While a player has 8 or more points, your opponent's home limit is reduced by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Talented: When you play an Event whose play requirement includes at least one of this card's colors, this card gets +2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponents flip 1 fewer cards during faceoffs involving at least one of their characters with 4 or more power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: During a Faceoff, pay [1] and discard a [Kindness] Friend to give one of your flipped cards +3 power until the end of the Faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: While a player has 8 or more points, your Critter Friends have +1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Retire this card to turn over a face-up or face-down Troublemaker. (This does not cover or uncover it.).

property.name: Text
property.value: Talented: When you play an Event whose play requirement includes at least one of this card's colors, you may put a 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has +1 power for each of your other Friends named Pukwudgie, Prickly Pest. Your deck may contain any number of Friends named Pukwudgie, Prickly Pest.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put a 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend token into play, you may exhaust this card to put a 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move this card to a Problem, you may exhaust this card to ready a Friend there.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opposing Troublemaker enters play face-up or is uncovered here, you may challenge it with this card. If a player has 8 or more points, you may challenge it with all of your characters at this card's Problem instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, you may discard all the cards in your hand to draw that many cards plus one.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, this turn, Friends in your hand have Hasty until you play a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: If one of your face-down Troublemakers would be turned face-up or uncovered, you may choose to not turn it face-up or uncover it instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this card is at a Problem with a Troublemaker, this card has Competitive 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: You have +2 power during faceoffs for each of your Resources attached to characters involved in the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may pay [1] less to play Accessories on this card. Accessories on this card have Vexing.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has +1 power for each action token an opponent has. While an opponent has at least [2], this card has Persistent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card to start a faceoff involving this card and an opposing Friend. If you win, you may put one of the cards you flipped for the faceoff into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this card, you may discard any number of cards, then draw a card for each card discarded this way. When you discard a card, put a 1 [Laughter] Earth Pony Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card can't be frightened. Immediate: Exhaust this card to put a Troublemaker from your hand into play. (Troublemakers enter play face-down unless otherwise stated.).

property.name: Text
property.value: Talented: When you play an Event whose play requirement includes at least one of this card's colors, you may exhaust this card to dismiss an opposing Resource. When an opposing Resource leaves play, put a +1 power counter on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card can't contribute its power towards confronting Problems unless you have 3 or fewer cards in your hand. At the start of your Score Phase, you may discard a card. If you don't, retire this Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Troublemakers here lose and can't have abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Talented: When you play an Event whose play requirement includes at least one of this card's colors, you may distribute two +1 power counters among up to 2 of your Friends with printed power 2 or less.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put an Event revealed this way into your hand and the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has Eccentric X, where X is the number of Events in your discard pile.

property.name: Subname
property.value: Bori & Alice, Givers of the Grove

property.name: Text
property.value: As this card enters play, name a Friend. Friends with that name can't be played. When this card is put into your discard pile from play, you may search your deck for a Friend with that name, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: If an opposing Friend or Troublemaker would be dismissed, you may exhaust this card to banish that Friend or Troublemaker instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, retire any number of Friends. If you do, put that many 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend tokens into play. If a player has 8 or more points, put twice that many 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend tokens into play instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move an opposing character, put a Delay counter on it. Opponent's can't move their characters with Delay counters on them unless they pay [1]. At the end of your opponent's turn, remove all Delay counters from opposing characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: While this card is flipped, players can't play Events. Immediate: Retire this card. If you do, players can't gain action tokens this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your Friends enters play, if it was the third Friend that entered play this turn, you may put a token copy of this card into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: During your turn, this card can't contribute its power to faceoffs. During your opponent's turn, this card can't contribute its power to confronting Problems.

property.name: Text
property.value: As this card enters play, choose a color. This card is that color. This card has -1 power for each color among characters you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: As this card enters play, you may reveal a Friend in your hand. This card is the revealed Friend's colors.

card.name: A Better Way To Be Bad

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: frighten up to two Friends; look at a player's hand and choose a card, then that player banishes that card; or name a card, put all cards in your discard pile with that name on top of your deck, and shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Search your deck for up to three Critter Friends with different names, reveal them, and put them into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Look at a player's hand and choose an Event. That player discards that card. If a player has 8 or more points, choose any card instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Put 2 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend tokens into play. At the end of the turn, if no player has 8 or more points, retire 2 Critter Friends.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Dismiss a Friend or Resource. That card's controller may put a number of 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend tokens equal to that card's cost into play under their control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Choose one of your Friends and an opposing Friend. Exchange control of those Friends until the end of the Score Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: You have +2 power during Faceoffs this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Move one of your characters. At the end of the turn, you may move one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Add an opposing exhausted character's power to one of your characters until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Until the end of the turn, whenever an opponent plays a card, you may put a card from your discard pile into your hand. Banish this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Gain control of an opposing Friend. At the end of your Score Phase, put that Friend on top of its owner's deck.

card.name: In My Head Like A Catchy Song

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: Search your deck for a Friend, reveal it, and put it into your hand; put a Friend from your discard pile into play; or opponents flip 1 fewer cards for faceoffs until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Choose a Problem. Until the end of the turn, characters, Resources, and Troublemakers there lose and can't have abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Reveal the top card of your deck, then move an opposing character with power less than the revealed card's power. If a player has 8 or more points, move up to two opposing characters with power less than the revealed card's power instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Frighten a Friend. If a player has 8 or more points, you may dismiss a frightened Friend instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this card on top of your deck, you may reveal it. If you do, gain [1], then shuffle your deck. Immediate: Put this card on top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Look at the top card of each player's deck, then put each card on the top or bottom of its owner's deck. If a player has 8 or more points, you may draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Each player chooses a card from another player's discard pile and banishes that card. Then, each player chooses a card in their discard pile and may put that card into their hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one into your hand, one on top of your deck, and one on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Friend. Double that Friend's power. That Friend loses and can't have abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. When a player wins a faceoff, that player gains control of this card. Immediate: If you won a faceoff this turn, you may pay [1] and exhaust this card to score a point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Friend. That Friend has Swift. When you move the attached Friend, it gets +1 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Friend. That Friend has +2 power. If a player has 8 or more points, you may play this card from your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. If one of your Friends would leave play, you may retire this card and discard 2 cards instead. While this card is in your discard pile, if one of your Friends would leave play, you may banish this card and 2 other cards from your discard pile instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. When you exhaust one or more opposing characters, put a Fatigue counter on this card. At the end of your opponent's turn, if this card has 3 or more Fatigue counters on it, your opponent retires an exhausted Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Main Phase: Exhaust this card to have each player with an even number of action tokens gain [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Immediate: Exhaust this card to gain control of a Friend you own.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. When this card enters play, draw a card. Immediate: Pay [1] and choose a color to reduce the play requirement of the next card you play this turn by 2 of the chosen color.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. When this card enters play, put 3 1 [Loyalty] Pegasus Friend tokens with Swift into play. When this card leaves play, put 3 1 [Loyalty] Pegasus Friend tokens with Swift into play. Immediate: Retire 3 Pegasus Friends to dismiss a Resource.

property.name: Text
property.value: During your opponent's turn, players need +2 power to confront this Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this card, you may put a Friend with cost 2 or less from your discard pile into play here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Opposing Friends have -1 power. Your Friends have +1 power. At the end of your turn, dismiss each opposing Friend with 0 or less power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. If one of your Friends would be retired for being in excess of your home limit, you may retire this card to put that Friend into its owner's hand instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Mane Character. When that character becomes involved in a faceoff, you may draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Friend. When this card enters play, banish an opposing Friend. When this card leaves play, put any cards banished this way into their owners' hands.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: During a faceoff, exhaust this card to move an opposing character to this card's Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of a faceoff involving this card, you may pay [2] to frighten a Friend involved in the Faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is dismissed, you may put two +1 power counters on another Troublemaker here.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has Competitive X, where X is the number of opposing characters here with Competitive. The same is true for Diligent, Eccentric, and Showy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay [2] to challenge this card with one of your characters here. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is turned face-up, you may pay [1] to dismiss an opposing Resource.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have 4 or more Friends here, your Friends here can't leave play.

property.name: Text
property.value: While your Mane Character is not boosted, it has +1 power. While your opponent's Mane Character is boosted, opponents need +2 power to confront this Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: You need -2 power to confront opposing Problems.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem becomes solved, your maximum hand size increases to 10 for the rest of the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you frighten a Friend for the first time each turn, you may move one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem becomes solved, you may search your deck for a card with no play requirement, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem is confronted, put an Ingredient counter on this card. When you play an Event, you may remove 2 Ingredient counters from this card to copy its effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: You need -1 power to confront this Problem for each card type among cards in your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of the game, choose a color. This card is that color. Main Phase: Pay [6] to turn this card over. You pay 1 less action token to turn this card over for each color among characters in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player confronts a Problem for the first time each turn, put a Friendship counter on this card. Main Phase: Exhaust this card and remove any number of Friendship counters from it to play a Friend with cost equal to the number of counters removed this way for free.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card enters play with a +1 power counter on it for each of your other Earth Pony Friends. When this card enters play, put a +1 power counter on each of your other Earth Pony Friends. Immediate: Remove a +1 power counter from one of your Earth Pony Friends. If you do, that Friend can't leave play this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card and one of your non-token Friends or Resources to have an opponent gain control of that Friend or Resource. Then, if that opponent controls 2 or more non-token Friends or Resources that you own, score a point.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of a faceoff involving this card, you may name a Friend. Until the end of the faceoff, when you flip a Friend with that name, put that Friend into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Friends involved in faceoffs can't be dismissed or frightened. At the end of a faceoff, if you didn't lose that faceoff, distribute two +1 power counters among up to two of your Friends. Immediate: Exhaust this card to end a faceoff. This card doesn't ready during its controller's next Ready Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your token Friends have +1 power and don't count against your home limit. Other Friends lose and can't have Unique. If one of your non-token Friends would leave play, you may retire a number of token Friends equal to that Friend's cost instead. If you do, that Friend doesn't leave play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Pay [1] to banish a Friend from a discard pile. If you do, this card loses all abilities gained this way, then gains that Friend's printed abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Until the end of the turn, you may play Events with Main Phase timing as Immediate actions (even if it isn't your Main Phase).

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: This turn, your Troublemakers don't prevent you from confronting Problems and you need X power less to confront each Problem, where X is the highest power among Troublemakers you control there.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home If you would discard a card, you may put that card on top of your deck instead. Immediate: Exhaust this card to discard a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Banish this card to search your deck for a Troublemaker, then put it into play. At the end of your turn, if this card is banished, you may pay [1] and banish one of your Troublemakers to put this card into play face-up.
